trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Portal]( https://azure.portal.com/), click **Browse** > **App Services**, locate and click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Portal]( https://azure.portal.com/), click **Browse** > **App Services**, locate and click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push**.

trans-unit.source: In Push notification services, click **Google (GCM)**, enter the **API Key** value that you obtained from GCM in the previous procedure, then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In Push notification services, click **Google (GCM)**, enter the **API Key** value that you obtained from GCM in the previous procedure, then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Set the GCM API key in the portal
trans-unit.target: Set the GCM API key in the portal

trans-unit.source: The Mobile App backend is now configured to use GCM to send push notifications to your app running on an Android device using the notification hub.
trans-unit.target: The Mobile App backend is now configured to use GCM to send push notifications to your app running on an Android device using the notification hub.
